channel.title: char-map on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in char-map on Hashnopolis

item.title: Jewels and Stones
item.description: You’re given strings J representing the types of stones that are jewels, and S representing the stones you have. Each character in S is a type of stone you have. You want to know how many of the stones you have are also jewels. The letters in J are guaranteed distinct, and all characters in J and S are letters. Letters are case sensitive, so "a" is considered a different type of stone from "A".
